title: Jiwon Choi
text:
Hi, I am Jiwon! I am studying Mathematical Sciences,  Applied Statistics, and  Computer Science at the University of Toronto :)
I’m an avid learner who is always eager to learn and discover new things about the world. I’m currently based out of downtown Toronto and especially interested in Data Science and Machine Learning. I truly believe people can achieve more with technologies and this will never end! Feel free to look around and reach out to me!

objectID: Analysis of Geographic and Demographic Patterns of Homelessness.html
href: Analysis of Geographic and Demographic Patterns of Homelessness.html
title: Analysis of Geographic and Demographic Patterns of Homelessness
text: This paper addresses the complex issue of homelessness in Toronto by conducting an in-depth analysis of the demographic and geographic trends in the city’s shelter system. Despite Toronto’s solid shelter system, there remain gaps in service that this study aims to highlight and address. Utilizing data from the Shelter Management Information System (SMIS), this paper aims to provide an updated and comprehensive view of urban homelessness, a topic often overlooked in contemporary research. View the full version of paper here.
